webscript.description:
Web Script that creates a Source SyncSetDefinition.

The request body should be of the form: 

   {
      "remoteUserName": "foo.bar@alfresco.com",
      "remotePassword": "xxx",
      "memberNodeRefs": ["workspace://SpacesStore/82ae718e-5ef3-46e1-99f8-c401bf678fb0"],
      "remoteTenantId": "tenantX",
      "targetFolderNodeRef": "workspace://SpacesStore/12345678-1234-abcd-wxyz-123456789012",
      "lockSourceCopy": false,
      "includeSubFolders": false,
      "isDeleteOnClient" : false,
      "isDeleteOnPrem" : false
   }
